'''MIR''' ('''MĬR-''') is an [[Elvish]] [[sundocarme|root]] signifying "precious"<ref name=PE165>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 165</ref> or "esteem, value".<ref name=PE37>{{PE|17}}, p. 37</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Quenya]]: ''[[mírë]]''; ''[[mĭrya]]''; ''[[mírima]]'' ("very precious, very lovely (of works of art only)");<ref name=PE165/> ''[[mirwa]]'' ("precious, valuable")<ref name=PE37/>
*[[Sindarin]]: ''[[mîr]]''

==Other versions of the legendarium==

In the [[The Etymologies|''Etymologies'']] appears the root MIR-, given no direct signification but with the derivatives [[Quenya]] ''míre'', [[Old Noldorin]] ''mîre'' and [[Noldorin]] ''mîr'' ("jewel, precious thing, treasure").<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 373</ref><ref>{{VT|45a}}, p. 35</ref>
